overview: Nixíí is a documentary spoken entirely in Me'phaa league (Tlapaneco) that collects part of the ceremonial life of the communities of the Municipality of Acatepec, Guerrero. In this community, the authorities are elected under the system of uses and customs and must carry out a series of acts of penance and purification to act with justice and maintain harmony and peace in their communities.
title: Nixíí
